text:
ISBN-13: 9780684854465.

Title: Mad Cowboy.
Subtitle: Plain Truth from the Cattle Rancher Who Won't Eat Meat.
Authors: Howard F. Lyman;Glen Merzer.
Categories: Health & Fitness.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=n2zDhP8PB5gC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: The former cattle rancher whose appearance on "The Oprah Winfrey Show" sparked a lawsuit against both him and Winfrey exposes the hazardous practices of the cattle and dairy industries..
